articles.author: Suzanne Lynch
articles.title: Irish-American woman in prime position to be governor of New York - The Irish Times
articles.description: Kathy Hochul will replace Andrew Cuomo if he quits or is impeached in harassment scandal
articles.content:
As New York governor Andrew Cuomos political future remains in the balance, the focus has turned to his would-be successor.
As lieutenant governor for New York, Kathy Hochul will replace Cuomo if he… [+1098 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19 Vaccine Mandates Split Corporate America - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: With Delta cases rising, Tyson and Walmart are insisting employees get the shot; others are sticking with persuasion and cash incentives
articles.content:
Business leaders broadly agree they need to get more workers vaccinated to keep the U.S. economy humming in the face of the fast-spreading Delta variant.
But theyre split over how best to do that. S… [+828 chars]
